text: Brenda Mary Robertson, CM, ONB (May 23, 1929 â€“ September 23, 2020) was a Canadian Conservative politician. She was a Senator from New Brunswick between 1984 and 2004. She was the first woman elected to the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick and the first woman to become a cabinet minister in the province. She was born in Sussex, New Brunswick. Robertson died on September 23, 2020 in Riverview, New Brunswick at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from New Brunswick
